title: [Large-Scale] Reinforcement Learning-Based Approach for Renewable Energy Building Energy System Control

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of power systems, control theory, basic machine learning concepts, and experience with Python programming
context.additional_context: Case-based learning emphasizing the use of actual Japanese building data, conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Explaining the design process of reinforcement learning control algorithms for off-grid operations in renewable energy-integrated buildings
Proposing a reward function structure that simultaneously satisfies battery lifespan extension and energy optimization
Applying Gaussian distribution-based offline reinforcement learning workflows to real-world building data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
